rule.name: Defenders of Humanity
rule.description: A unit with this ability that is within range of an objective marker (as specified in the mission) controls the objective marker even if there are more enemy models within range of that objective marker. If an enemy unit within range of the same objective marker has a similar ability, then the objective marker is controlled by the player who has the most models within range of it as normal.

rule.name: The Red Thirst
rule.description: In any turn in which a unit with this ability charged, was charged or made a Heroic Intervention, you may add 1 to its wound rolls in the Fight phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 made for friendly BLOOD ANGELS units within 6" of this model.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This model has a 4+ invulnerable save.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

rule.name: The Red Thirst
rule.description: In any turn in which a unit with this ability charged, was charged or made a Heroic Intervention, you may add 1 to its wound rolls in the Fight phase.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: Each time the bearer fights, it can make 1 additional attack with this weapon.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: During deployment, if this model has a jump pack, you can set it up high in the skies instead of placing it on the battlefield. At the end of any of your Movement phases this model can assault from above - set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" away from any enemy models.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If your army is Battle-forged and the bearer is on the battlefield, roll a D6 each time you use a Stratagem; on a 5+, you gain a Command Point.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: A model with a storm shield has a 3+ invulnerable save.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: When attacking with this weapon, you must subtract 1 from the hit roll.

rule.name: 5. Gift of Foresight
rule.description: Roll aD6 each time your Warlord loses a wound, re-rolling rolls of 1; on a 6, that wound is ignored and has no effect. If your Warlord also has the Black Rage ability, they instead ignore wounds on rolls of 5 or 6, but the similar ability to ignore wounds from the Black Rage has no effect.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can add 1 to this unit's Attacks characteristic in the Fight phase if it charged in the preceding Charge phase. In addition, roll a D6 each time this unit loses a wound. On a 6 the wound is ignored and has no effect.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can re-roll failed charge rolls and failed hit rolls in the Fight phase for friendly DEATH COMPANY units within 6" of Lemartes.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: All friendly DEATH COMPANY units within 6" of Lemartes can use his Leadership instead of their own.

If an enemy unit within range of the same objective marker has a similar ability, then the objective marker is controlled by the player who has the most models within range of it as normal.

rule.name: Grim Resolve
rule.description: You can re-roll all hit rolls of 1 for this unit whenever it shoots (including when firing Overwatch) so long as it did not move in its prior Movement phase. In addition, this unit can never lose more than one model as the result of any single failed morale test.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This model has a 4+ invulnerable save.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 made for friendly <CHAPTER> units within 6" of this model.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If a model in this unit is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a D6 before removing the model from the battlefield; on a 6 it explodes, and each unit within 3" suffer a mortal wounds.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If this unit Advances, it gains a 4+ invulnerable save against all shooting attacks until the start of your next Movement phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can re-roll failed hit rolls for friendly RAVENWING units within 6" of this model.

rule.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
rule.description: You can re-roll failed Morale tests for this unit.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: This weapon has Strength x 2 if Sammael charged in the preceding Charge phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Enemy units do not gain any bonuses to their saving throws for being in cover against shooting attacks made by friendly RAVENWINGunits that are within 6" of this model.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for friendly DARK ANGELSunits within 6" of this model.

characteristic.value: If this unit Advances, it gains a 4+ invulnerable save against all shooting attacks until the start of your next Movement phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This unit automatically passes Morale tests. In addition, you can re-roll failed hit rolls in the Fight phase for attacks by this unit that target a FALLEN unit.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: When this model advances, add 6" to its movement statistic for this phase instead of rolling a dice.

characteristic.value: On a hit roll of 1, the bearer is slain after all shots from this weapon have been resolved.

characteristic.value: Each wound roll of 6 made with this weapon causes D3 wounds instead of 1.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Your opponent must subtract 1 from any hit rolls they make for shooting attacks that target friendly <CHAPTER> units within 6" of any friendly Ravenwing Darkshrouds.

characteristic.value: If this unit Advances, it gains a 4+ invulnerable save against all shooting attacks until the start of your next Movement phase.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: If a model in this unit is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a D6 before removing the model from the battlefield; on a 6 it explodes, and each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Once per game, instead of shooting any weapons in the Shooting phase, the vehicle can use its Smoke Launchers; until your next Shooting phase your opponent must subtract 1 from all hit rolls for ranged weapons that target this vehicle.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: Roll a D6 each time this model loses a wound; on a 6 the damage is ignored and that wound is lost.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This unit may issue one order per turn to the soldiers under their command at the start of their Shooting phase. Orders may only be issued to INFANTRY units within 6" of this unit that have the same <REGIMENT> keyword as this unit. To issue an order, pick a target unit and choose which order you wish to issue from the table below. A unit may only be affected by one order per turn.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.

characteristic.name: Description
characteristic.value: This model may use the Voice of Command ability twice in each of your turns. Resolve the effects of the first order before issuing the second order.

characteristic.name: Abilities
characteristic.value: Each time the bearer fights, it can make 1 additional attack with this weapon.
